Barbara, it is chainmail...see Nakajima NObori portrait...he is
wearing chainmail right under his clothes...read Tenma house incident
(my best effort in understanding the fish)
http://p076.ezboard.com/fshinsengumiheadquartersfrm17.showMessage?topicID=22.topic

Remember in Gohatto when Okita tells Hijikata (runs into the room late
at night) that the old dude and everyone's object of desire went to
that inn alone...Okita ran into the room wearing mesh/armor thing
too...you can see it on his arms.

Other portraits by Nakajima show other Shinsengumi wearing chainmail
(if they were dressed traditionally---some wore modern clothing).

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> Did ya notice that even in PMK Saitou wears the black t-shirt or a 
> variation of it  it's sort of a mesh type thing as I recall.......
